title.rendered: Unofficial 2022-2023 School Budget & Board of Education Results

content.rendered:
Residents of the Saratoga Springs City School District approved the proposed $137,138,255 school budget for 2022-2023 by a vote of 4747 to 1501. In addition, the bus bond proposition was approved by a vote of 4338 to 1238 and the facilities bond proposition was approved by a vote of 4545 to 1643.

John Brueggemann (3744 votes), Natalya Lakhtakia (3591 votes), and Dean Kolligian (3311 votes) were re-elected to the Board of Education.

All results posted are unofficial until they are accepted by the Board of Education. The next Board of Education meeting is scheduled for May 18, 2022, at 7 p.m.

Thank you to everyone in our school community who voted.
